img.data-caption: Hats off to our fantastic food services director and her staff for providing our students the best school meals in kitchens clean enough to eat off the floors. Take a look at the following impromptu photos.

div.style: float:left; clear:left; width:558px; margin:-273px 0 0 7px; position:relative; z-index:3;

p.style: margin: 0.5pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; text-align: right; line-height: 11.6pt; vertical-align: baseline
margin: 11.45pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; line-height: 11.6pt; vertical-align: baseline
margin: 9.2pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; text-align: justify; line-height: 11.5pt; vertical-align: baseline
p.span: I hope this message finds you and your families safe and well. Today, Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker announced that remote learning in Illinois will be extended through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.

p.style: margin: 9.2pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; text-align: justify; line-height: 11.5pt; vertical-align: baseline
p.span: Although in-person learning has been suspended for the remainder of the year, at Hazel Crest School District 1521/2, I assure you our entire staff remains committed to learning and engaging with all students through remote learning, as well as continuing with our food distribution program.

p.style: margin: 9.2pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; text-align: justify; line-height: 11.5pt; vertical-align: baseline
p.span: Like you, we are saddened by the reality that our school community will not be able to reconvene in person this school year due to this public health crisis. So many of you have worked so hard to learn and grow in both the classroom and in extracurricularÂ
nouncement may feel like a step back.

p.style: margin: 9.2pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; text-align: justify; line-height: 11.5pt; vertical-align: baseline
p.span: However, the final chapter of this school year hasnât been written yet. These past fewÂ
weeks have proven our school community is more resilient, more capable and more compassionate than maybe what we previously reali
strength will shine through during the remainder of the school year, and we will emerge even stronger.

p.style: margin: 9.25pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; text-align: justify; line-height: 11.5pt; vertical-align: baseline
p.span: Having said that, todayâs announcement will result in significant and multipleÂ

scheduling changes in our district. As this announcement about the end of the school year was just made by Governor Pritzker this afternoon, it will take us a few days to sort out the many schedule details that are on the books, including spring activities, promotion, graduation, etc. Please be patient as we work as a district to get information to you in the next several weeks.

p.style: margin: 9.2pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; text-align: justify; line-height: 11.5pt; vertical-align: baseline
p.span: I know this is not the school year that any of us imagined, but I want to thank you for your patience and understanding as we have dealt with this unprecedented situation together. This period of Remote Learning offers us new ways to learn and grow, and out of this Pandemic, we will emerge stronger. Plans will be underway soon for the return to in-person learning next school year.

p.style: margin: 9.15pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; text-align: justify; line-height: 11.5pt; vertical-align: baseline
p.span: Itâs important we continue to work together and support our students. I can't thank youÂ
enough for all that you are doing as we all work together through this.

p.style: margin: 11.45pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; line-height: 11.6pt; vertical-align: baseline
margin: 8.4pt 0in 0.0001pt 0.05in; font-size: 13px; background-color: #fefefe; line-height: 18.55pt; vertical-align: baseline
